analysis.description:
ERC20Basic (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#115-124) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#117-122)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#259-268):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(_token) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#263)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#264-265)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#276-288):
	External calls:
	- balance = _token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#284)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(_token) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#284-285)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#287)

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#301-316) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[_token] (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#311-316)
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#310-316)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0x9cea5d2db84075f80142dc8746297e3905f1ad69.sol#90-95) should be declared external
